member.name: WS_ASYNC_CONTEXT
member.summary: Used with the Async Model to specify the asynchronous callback and a pointer which will be passed to the asynchronous callback.

member.name: WS_ASYNC_CONTEXT.callback
member.summary: The callback function to call if the operation completes asynchronously. This field may not be NULL.

member.name: WS_ASYNC_CONTEXT.callbackState
member.summary: A pointer to user-defined data which will passed to the asynchronous callback function if the operation completes asynchronously.
